title: Primary Children's Hospital | Intermountain Healthcare | Intermountain Home
description: Primary Children's Hospital is a not-for-profit, free-standing children's hospital providing quality healthcare for children with complex illnesses and injuries from across the United States.
cleaned_text: Hospital and Clinic Visitor Guidelines For your safety and the safety of others, Intermountain requires everyone to mask in all facilities. Regardless of state or local mask mandates, or a person's vaccine or COVID-19 recovery status, everyone still needs to wear a mask at Primary Children's. Two designated visitors are allowed in the patient room each day (24-hour period) in most situations.
